citation.article-title: Description of Sphingosinicella xenopeptidilytica sp. nov., a beta-peptide-degrading species, and emended descriptions of the genus Sphingosinicella and the species Sphingosinicella microcystinivorans
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of Sphingosinicella microcystinivorans Maruyama et al. 2006
The species shares the characteristics listed in the emended genus description.
Data listed in Table 2 add to the original species description.
Growth is observed at temperatures in the range 20–37 °C, at pH 5.6 and 9.7 and at 0 and 2 % NaCl (w/v).
